GlobalIntentID.description: Global Intent ID is the ASPSP identifier for the complex payment setup intent, It identifies one or more individual complex payment

IntentID.description: Intent ID is the ASPSP identifier for the individual complex payment setup intent

EndToEndIdentification.description: Unique identification assigned by the initiating party to unambiguously identify the transaction. This identification is passed on, unchanged, throughout the entire end-to-end chain. Usage: The end-to-end identification can be used for reconciliation or to link tasks relating to the transaction. It can be included in several messages related to the transaction.
